definition: to rest for a bit/to take a breather
small/tiny/few/young
variant of 憩[qi4]
to rest

sentences.english: A vendor rests next to watermelons at a fruit market in Hangzhou, east China's Zhejiang province May 16, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 浙江杭州一水果市场里，小贩在成堆的西瓜旁小憩。

sentences.english: Relax in the patio furniture until you get kicked out.
sentences.chinese: 坐在户外家具用品上小憩，直至被踢。

sentences.english: ’ I’d rush off from a game of cards or a wrestling match for my assignment.
sentences.chinese: 我立刻从纸牌游戏或者小憩中回过神来接受任务。

sentences.english: If your boss didn't use the nap pod, would you?
sentences.chinese: 如果你的老板自己都不使用小憩舱，你会吗？

sentences.english: Take regular breaks to rest and have your special treats.
sentences.chinese: 定时小憩一下，吃点你的特别小食。

sentences.english: And take brief naps during the day to get extra sleep.
sentences.chinese: 并在白天小憩片刻以获取充足的睡眠。

sentences.english: A man naps in his hammock along the bank of the Sangker River in Battambang.
sentences.chinese: 马德望桑可河畔，一名男子在吊床上小憩。

sentences.english: Be like a very inactive feline more to rest a tiny beneath the bathing of the sunlight at this time.
sentences.chinese: 此时更像一只懒懒的猫咪在阳光的沐浴下小憩。

sentences.english: Site stress-reducing techniques such as stretching and taking a break.
sentences.chinese: 或是有些减压小技巧像伸展体操和小憩一下。

sentences.english: Every 15-20 minutes, get up from your desk, and take a breathing break.
sentences.chinese: 每隔15到20分钟，站起身，小憩一下。

sentences.english: And when the wrestling has tired both the animal expert and huge Agee out, they both enjoy a nap together.
sentences.chinese: 玩累了，这位动物专家就与庞然大物亚基一起去小憩。

sentences.english: I sit in the top of the wood, my eyes closed.
sentences.chinese: 我在树顶上小憩，合上双眼。

sentences.english: Not even a swarm of flies disturbs a cheetah's after-dinner catnap.
sentences.chinese: 一群苍蝇正打扰这这头猎豹的饭后小憩。

sentences.english: When his feet grew tired and weary, he would curl up in the weeds and rest.
sentences.chinese: 当它的脚步渐渐疲惫，它会蜷缩在杂草丛中暂时小憩。

sentences.english: I know it’s pointless to continue, so I take a break from work.
sentences.chinese: 我知道继续将毫无意义，因此我停止工作小憩一会。

leisure

deck chair/recliner/couch/lounge
to sleep soundly/fast asleep

satisfied/pleased/contented

to sleep soundly/to fall into a deep sleep

bench
